attributes.title: Horrible😡
attributes.review: this app is awful and triggering on several levels. there was homophobia, xenophobia, racism, bigotry and worst of all fascism. i cannot stress how harmful this app is to the public especially with so many uneducated, weak minded people out there who are susceptible to misinformation and brainwashing. Don’t waste your GB😒

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I first opened the app and it started being weird. It asked for my phone number but the only phone number I have is my grandmas but I’m 76 years old and she’s dead and I couldn’t get verified. I feel like it’s racist to people like me (Mexican btw)

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: this is by far the WORST app i’ve ever purchased. i opened up the app just to see the idiotic president himself cursing me out! he told me i have nothing to live for then called me some names that shall not be named. get this app off the appstore at once. i never want to see it here again.

attributes.title: confused☹️
attributes.review: I'm a little confused because when I downloaded the app there was a warning about age-restricted material? So you have to be 17 and up?? However, age has never seemed to matter to Donnie in the past, so why is he switching up now? Someone help 😖😫

attributes.title: Disgusted
attributes.review: i opened the app and the first thing i saw was this cheeto with dementia and i was HORRIFIED. i came here for other things like stupidity not chips and fake spray tans. it’s going to take a lot of eye bleach and tide pods to be able to forget about the horrible things that have crossed my vision today.

attributes.title: DISCUSTING
attributes.review: first off right when I open the app I saw a nude pictures of a CHEETO🖐🏼 my eyes will forever be punished Because of our pig of a president wanted to Record himself getting a spray tan naked🤮. honestly whoever votes for Trump 2020 has to be brainwashed. Trump is disgusting and I will never share this app you shouldn’t either!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is not it sis. When I saw this Cheeto it made me so sick. I can’t believe this is even an app. He can’t even stand right like c’mon sis and now you can’t drink a cup of water. This cheetoh really needs help and also he needs a hair transplant. This app makes me wanna 🤢🤢🤢. Uh Chile anyways this app is trash.

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I almost bleach out my eyes from the horrific things I saw on here. First I get a picture of Cheeto head on my screen then I get a link to see if only fans. They EVEN GAVE ME A PREVIEW and now I want to stab my eyes out and eat them so I never have to see this ever again.

attributes.title: Disturbing
attributes.review: When I opened this app it gave my phone multiple virtual stds which caused my phone to completely crash. I tried to open it again and was assaulted by image after image of random Cheetos in poorly tailored suits. Not at all what was promised.

attributes.title: The Cheeto man 💀💀
attributes.review: This app is so racist sexist and homophobic as part alien and part animal and part male it is so disgusting I hate this app it is way to offensive also!! There is also this huge Cheeto man that is always there and he is way to scary and censored please do not get this app 🤡💀🙈💞✨💅🍬🌺💕💘💎🦋🍭
